title: Mortgage and refinance interest rates today, January 20, 2026: Annual rates plummet
full_text: Mortgage and refinance interest rates today, January 20, 2026: Annual rates plummet. These are today's mortgage and refinance rates. They are significantly lower than they were last January, so it could be a good time to buy. Lock in your.... In 2026, mortgage rates have started much lower than they did at the beginning of 2025. According to Zillow, the average 30-year fixed mortgage rate is 5.90% 82 basis points lower than this time last… [+4142 chars]
